institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Ministry of Employment and Labor Consignment Project Subsidy Processing Rules/Article 3 (Method of Payment)
contents: Article 3 (Method of Payment) ① A person performing the duties of a fund treasurer pursuant to Article 145, Paragraph 8 of the Enforcement Decree of the Employment Insurance Act shall transfer the expenditure budget necessary for payment of employer competency development support funds under Article 27 of the Employment Insurance Act to the employed labor. The person who applies to the Deputy Minister and performs the duties of a fund disbursement officer disburses to the entrusted financial institution through D-Brain. ② The entrusted financial institution pays the subsidy to the applicant through the Employment Insurance System (EI). .
